description: Baseline compatibility for stock ComponentizeJS (StarlingMonkey) runtime without WarpGrid shims

packages.name: pg
packages.blockingIssue: Requires Node.js net module for TCP socket connections
packages.notes: Cannot establish TCP connections; net.Socket unavailable in StarlingMonkey

packages.name: ioredis
packages.blockingIssue: Requires Node.js net module with full duplex stream, events, and reconnection logic
packages.notes: Deep dependency on net.Socket, events.EventEmitter, and stream.Duplex

packages.name: express
packages.workaround: Use hono (request/response handler model compatible with WASI)
packages.notes: Express fundamentally requires Node.js http module server model

packages.name: hono
packages.notes: Web-standard request/response model, no Node.js dependencies

packages.name: zod
packages.notes: Pure TypeScript schema validation, fully compatible

packages.name: jose
packages.blockingIssue: PEM key import requires fs.readFileSync for loading key files
packages.workaround: Use JWK format keys embedded in source or environment variables
packages.notes: JWS/JWE signing and verification work via SubtleCrypto; PEM file loading fails

packages.name: uuid
packages.notes: Uses crypto.getRandomValues() which is available in StarlingMonkey

packages.name: lodash-es
packages.notes: Pure JavaScript utility library, fully compatible

packages.name: date-fns
packages.notes: Pure JavaScript date utilities, no Node.js dependencies

packages.name: nanoid
packages.notes: Uses crypto.getRandomValues() which is available in StarlingMonkey

packages.name: superjson
packages.notes: Pure JavaScript serialization library, fully compatible

packages.name: drizzle-orm
packages.blockingIssue: Requires a database driver (pg, mysql2) to execute queries
packages.workaround: Use with warpgrid/pg shim when WarpGrid shims are active
packages.notes: Schema definition and query building work; query execution fails without driver

packages.name: kysely
packages.blockingIssue: Requires a database dialect/driver (pg, mysql2) for query execution
packages.workaround: Use with warpgrid/pg shim when WarpGrid shims are active
packages.notes: Query builder and type system work; execution requires a connected driver

packages.name: better-sqlite3
packages.blockingIssue: Native C++ addon requiring Node.js N-API; cannot compile to Wasm
packages.workaround: Use sql.js (Emscripten SQLite) or WarpGrid database proxy with Postgres
packages.notes: Fundamentally incompatible â€” native binary addon

packages.name: node-fetch
packages.blockingIssue: Requires Node.js http/https modules for request execution
packages.workaround: Use native fetch() API (available in StarlingMonkey)
packages.notes: Import succeeds but actual HTTP requests fail; use native fetch instead

packages.name: axios
packages.blockingIssue: Requires XMLHttpRequest or Node.js http module for request execution
packages.workaround: Use native fetch() API (available in StarlingMonkey)
packages.notes: Import succeeds but adapter selection fails; no compatible adapter available

packages.name: dotenv
packages.workaround: Use WASI environment variables directly via process.env polyfill
packages.notes: Import succeeds but config() fails without filesystem access

packages.name: pino
packages.blockingIssue: Requires process.stdout writable stream and process.env for configuration
packages.notes: Basic pino() call works but transport and destination features fail

packages.name: fast-json-stringify
packages.notes: Pure JavaScript JSON serialization, fully compatible

packages.name: ajv
packages.notes: Pure JavaScript schema validation, fully compatible
